column1:
Title: Summary comparison - correctness policy

Objective
Evaluate which summary includes less false information.

Instructions
You are given 2 summaries (A, B) created from a reference text. Evaluate which summary includes less false information.

Scoring Criteria
A significantly better than B (Score: -2)
A slightly better than B (Score: -1)
Neither A or B is better than the other (Score: 0)
B slightly better than A (Score: 1)
B significantly better than B (Score 2)

column9:
Title: Summary comparison - accuracy policy

Objective
Evaluate which summary accurately represents the information from the reference text.

Instructions
You are given 2 summaries (A, B) created from a reference text. Evaluate which summary accurately represents the information from the reference text.

Scoring Criteria
A accurately represents the information from the reference text (Score: 2)
Both A and B accurately represent the information from the reference text (Score: 1)
Neither A nor B accurately represents the information from the reference text (Score: 0)
B accurately represents the information from the reference text (Score: -2)
